text: Hidayet "Hedo" Türkoğlu (born March 19, 1979 in Gaziosmanpaşa, İstanbul, Turkey) is a Turkish basketball player. He was drafted by the Sacramento Kings with the 16th pick in the 1st round of the 2000 NBA Draft. He has also played with the Sacramento Kings from 2000 to 2003, San Antonio Spurs from 2003 to 2004, Orlando Magic from 2004 to 2009, Toronto Raptors from 2009 to 2010, Phoenix Suns in 2010 and currently the Orlando Magic since 2010 when he was traded to the Magic in 2010 along with Jason Richardson and Earl Clark for Vince Carter, Marcin Gortat, Mickaël Piétrus, a 2011 first-round draft pick and $3 million. == Other websites == * Hedo Türkoğlu's NBA player profile Category:1979 births Category:Living people Category:Los Angeles Clippers players Category:Orlando Magic players Category:Phoenix Suns players Category:Sacramento Kings players Category:San Antonio Spurs players Category:Small forwards Category:Sports executives and administrators Category:Sportspeople from Istanbul Category:Toronto Raptors players Category:Turkish basketball players Category:Turkish Muslims
title: Hedo Türkoğlu
